name: Santa Rush-Xmas Adventure
description: It’s Christmas Eve, and Santa was gearing up to distribute all the gifts among the kids, but to everyone’s disappointment the gifts are now scattered, as the elves accidentally released the Santa sack. Help Santa collect all the gifts , so that the kids are not left disappointed. Santa has to ride, while avoiding all the obstacles that come his way and move on. Swipe left and right for the special power sleigh movement and swipe down for power up. You can collect Gifts with the special rockets which helps you for power dash. He would have to slide side of the boards, skip from the snowman and frozen lake, and also avoid the Ice walls that appears every now and then. You have limited lives and a great distance to cover, if you find a Flying Object on the way it will help you cover the distance and also the collect achieve a better score. Start riding, as there’s no time to waste!!
